node_modules/

logs/
_.log

pids/
_.pid
_.seed
\*.pid.lock

# Directory for instrumented libs generated by coverage tools

coverage/

# Dependency directories

jspm_packages/

# Optional npm cache directory

.npm

# Optional eslint cache

.eslintcache

# Optional stylelint cache

.stylelintcache

# dotenv environment variables file

.env
.env.local
.env.\*.local

# Build output

dist/
build/

# IDE files

.vscode/
.idea/
_.sublime-project
_.sublime-workspace

# OS files

Thumbs.db

# Yarn v2+

.yarn/\*
!.yarn/patches
!.yarn/releases
!.yarn/plugins
!.yarn/sdks
!.yarn/versions

# Mac specific

.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Temporary files
